name: La Dame Vase L
description: La Dame Vase in Large is a beautiful sculptural piece that is both feminine & bold. Available in other shapes & sizes to form a dramatic cluster of vases. Paris - 1 unit in stock Black Shell. Handmade. Black Pen Shell, fiber glass interior. All R&Y Augousti vases can support water. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines Acclaimed design duo Ria & Yiouri Augousti have established themselves since the 1990's as pioneers of modern-vintage style through their luxurious art-deco inspired collections.
